description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à South Malé Atoll, Maldives. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Ultra-Lux Five-Star Maldives Private Island Paradise
hotels.description: Escape to the Maldives and discover a slice of pure paradise at the five-star Como Cocoa Island resort, located on a secluded private island. Soak in the magical blues of the sky and sea, with each elegant villa boasting panoramic views of the Indian Ocean and the turquoise lagoon. This luxurious oasis celebrates relaxation and restoration with refined wellness treatments, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and romantic private dining. Each day brings adventure with a sunset cruise or moving nature experience, and while evenings are spent with your toes in the sand as you indulge in a memorable meal overlooking the ocean at the beachfront Ufaa restaurant.

seo.title: Hôtels à South Malé Atoll - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à South Malé Atoll, Maldives avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
